web.author: <!-- Enter your name here, so it appears at the bottom of the page, giving you credit for this translation -->
web.unsupported-browser: Your browser may not support all radio stations. Please open ETS2 Local Radio in either Mozilla Firefox or Microsoft Edge.
web.microsoft-edge: If the playback stops once you minimise the window, then please allow Microsoft Edge to run as a background app by going to Windows settings > Privacy > Background Apps.
web.controlled-remotely: This player is being controlled remotely
web.closest-city: Closest city is: , metres away
web.enter-peerid-body: Please enter the PeerID you see on the device you want to connect to:

Install plugin for
Euro Truck Simulator 2
server.install-plugin-ats:
Install plugin for

server.install-overlay:
Do you want to install the in-game overlay?
(This will overwrite an already existing d3d9.dll, and it may in rare cases cause the game to crash when exiting the game)
server.remove-overlay:
Do you want to remove the in-game overlay?
(This will remove any existing d3d9.dll)
server.ets2-folder-dialog: Please select the ETS2/ATS installation folder, usually found in C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\SteamApps\common\{Euro Truck Simulator 2/American Truck Simulator}
